html: (24) Behold, ye are of nothing.—This is the summing up of the prophet, speaking as in the Judge’s name. The idol was “nothing in the world” ( 1 Corinthians 8:4). The demonic view of the gods of the heathen does not appear, as in St. Paul’s argument ( 1 Corinthians 10:20), side by side with that of their nothingness.
